title: Spacious 2 Bedroom-Lorain Station Area-Move In Ready!
posting_body: Located in Cleveland's Historic Lorain Station area, this suite has been updated and provides all the modern amenities that make for a great living experience.
This spacious one bedroom with bonus room / 1 bathroom suite offers a spacious floor plan.
The suite features two bedrooms with plenty of space.
There are abundant closets, all new luxury vinyl plank flooring throughout the living areas as well as in the bedroom.
Other features include window coverings, new light fixtures, ceiling fans, and freshly painted with neutral colors.
The kitchen features abundant cabinetry, a frost-free refrigerator, and a gas range.
There is a small area off the kitchen to put chairs out back and enjoy the warm Cleveland nights.
The bathroom features a new vanity cabinet, a soaking tub, a new toilet, and new lighting fixtures.
ASK HOW YOU MAY QUALIFY FOR A FREE MONTH OF RENT!
The Laverne Apartments is minutes from public transportation, restaurants, churches, gas stations, highways, and more.
